title: <no title>
body:
Revenue: #. Click Sales to view sales performance

  • Change time frame by clicking Last 30 Days, Last 60 Days, Year to Date, or Life to Date

  • Hover over a data point to view revenue on a specific date

  • View the amount of money or numbers under Total Revenue, Average Amount, and Transactions

  • Click the dollar amount to the right of a row to view the payments to a bank account
